title: On single-variable Witten zeta functions of rank 2 root systems
abstract:
We use a Mellin-transform-based method to simultaneously analyse
single-variable Witten zeta functions of all rank $2$ irreducible root systems.
We obtain satisfactory details regarding their pole locations, values of
residues and special values. We also mention a connection between Witten zeta
function to Eisenstein series.
